name: Futanari Sex - BDSM Room
description:
About the game
An explicit erotic visual novel about a couple formed by a woman and a futanari. The two thought of using the services of a dominatrix in order to explore their fantasies.
Visual Novel description
Scarlet and Charity were a normal couple, until the latter decided to get a sex-changing surgery.
Charity wanted to become a futanari in order to be able to please her girlfriend in ways she couldn't before.
After that operation, the two realized that nothing could stop them from having an even more interesting sex life.
Not being a fan of monogamy, they decided to try with a third person.
The two thought of using the services of a dominatrix. A person who can understand their needs and satisfy their individual desires.
This story contains soft and hardcore scenes of BDSM. Play the game to live the fantasy along the three characters.
